With stunning settings under the Athenian night sky and a charming cast, including Kristy Swanson and John Ratzenberger, this one's sure to leave you pondering life's big questions.

Or, if you'd prefer something a bit more action-packed, "End of Watch" is a gripping, gritty police drama that delves into the daily struggles of two young officers. With an all-star cast, including David Harbour and Frank Grillo, this intense film will keep you on the edge of your seat.
